name: product-card.toml

component.name: Product Card
component.description: Displays product/pricing plan with features list and selection button

rawContent:
[component]
id = "product-card"
name = "Product Card"
description = "Displays product/pricing plan with features list and selection button"

[component.props]
product = "Product"
onSelect = "(id: number) => void"

[component.features]
list = [
  "Product name and description",
  "Price with currency formatting",
  "Features checklist",
  "Popular badge indicator",
  "Select plan button"
]

[component.styling]
hover = "shadow-lg transition"
popular = "border-primary shadow-md"
responsive = true

[relations]
entities = ["product"]
pages = ["products"]

[implementation]
component = "ProductCard"
file = "core/app/src/pages/prototype/ProductsPage.tsx"
preview = "/prototype/products"
status = "implemented"
